alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Laclede; Phelps; Texas; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:09AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Wright, north central Douglas, southeastern Laclede, Pulaski, western Texas and western Phelps Counties through 345 AM CST... At 309 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Richland to 8 miles north of Hartville to 6 miles southeast of Ava. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Leonard Wood, Waynesville, Mountain Grove, St. Robert, Cabool, Houston, Richland, Dixon, Dawson, Norwood, Doolittle, Newburg, Huggins, Plato, Manes, Beulah, Lynchburg, Falcon, Success and Laquey. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 145 and 169, and between mile markers 171 and 177. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
